com.xlab.glodocs.api.db
Class Document

java.lang.Object
  com.xlab.glodocs.api.db.Document

public class Document
extends java.lang.Object

General class to work with document in database
Contains all document's parameters such as owner, creationDate and others Document's data is stored in JSONObject value

Author:
Lapitskiy Anton
